multipleChoice.strength: You showed strong skills in multiple-choice questions, demonstrating good recall and understanding
multipleChoice.weakness: Focus on reading each option carefully in multiple-choice questions and eliminating incorrect answers

trueFalse.strength: You demonstrated good reasoning on true-false questions, showing logical thinking skills
trueFalse.weakness: Review concepts tested in true-false questions and pay attention to absolute words like 'always' or 'never'

shortAnswer.strength: You expressed yourself clearly in short-answer responses, showing good communication skills
shortAnswer.weakness: Work on providing complete, detailed answers for short-answer questions - include all parts of the question

Mathematics.general: Remember to show your work step-by-step and double-check your calculations
